channel.title: Coming of age
channel.description:
Explores the thoughts and feelings of American youth in the 20th century. Writer-director Ben Park talks with teenagers and parents, teachers and friends.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Suburbia sees the dawn
item.description: A successful teenage movement for control of drinking and driving is analyzed.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers--Alcohol use

item.title: What are teenagers made of
item.description: A kaleidoscopic cross-section of teenage thought and opinion. The program features a guest appearance by Margaret Mead.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: The rocking rebel
item.description: What are the meanings behind the musical addictions of teenagers? A brief history and interpretation of "outlaw music" and rock and roll. Alan Lomax is a featured guest.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Barbara joined the Al-a-Teen
item.description: In the Al-a-Teen, an organization of children of alcoholics, Barbara tried to find some meaning in the tensions that surround her and her family.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Three in a gang
item.description: Teenage fighting gang members talk about what they do.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Five sat down
item.description: This program is a documentary of a headline integration incident.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Rita looks for older men
item.description: This program explores why a certain young woman prefers older men and what it means. Bertram Schaffner is a featured guest.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Jim and his old man
item.description: Jim's father appears to resent him. Why?
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Joey has his doubts
item.description: A glimpse of one young man coming of age amid tensions of status.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Vic wants to be an actor
item.description: From family and church, Vic has drawn strength to make decisions even when they conflict with his religion and family background.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Five for segregation
item.description: This program presents a capsule view of upper class, articulate, southern youth and its world.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers

item.title: Suburbia in dismay
item.description: Teenage drinking and fast driving continue despite parental interference. Includes an interview with Margaret Mead.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers--Alcohol use

item.title: Joanne goes back to Grandma
item.description: Whenever her father gets drunk Joanne is sent to Grandma for a while in, this, another "coming of age" vignette.
item.dc:creator: Park, Ben
item.dc:subject: Teenagers
